channel.title: Command question
channel.description: Um, I noticed that there are a few commands that can be built into the client, can someone code a noclip for me?

item.title: Command question
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

No he asked for the code in the client. Heres the code for my clients no clip command.

[code]if(aString887.equals("::noclip"))
{
for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++)
{
for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++)
{
for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++)
aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0;

                            }

                        }

                    }[/code]

If it’s not already in your client then it looks as though you might have to edit class 11. Youd be better of downloading a client base with noclip already in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Command question
item.dc:creator: @sean2 sean_
item.description:
@sean2 wrote:

here’s the one I use.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!"); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = false; }
